tool_description: This API uses a comprehensive methodology to analyze various factors and determine the spam score of a website from 0 to 100, from best to worst, with messages of possible causes of spam.
name: Web Spam Checker
title: Web Spam Checker

api_list.name: GET domain name
api_list.description: Type the name of a domain correctly and get two values with the spam level of the domain and messages about its possible causes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web-spam-checker.p.rapidapi.com/web_spam/lookkle.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-spam-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web-spam-checker.p.rapidapi.com/web_spam/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-spam-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
